Objects.Name: mantra compassion mu
Objects.Description: Mu, the Mantra of Compassion is here.

Objects.Name: lum mantra humility
Objects.Description: Lum, the Mantra of Humility, is here.

Objects.Name: beh mantra justice
Objects.Description: Beh, the Mantra of Justice, is here.

Objects.Name: ohm mantra spirituality
Objects.Description: Ohm, the Mantra of Spirituality, is here.

Objects.Name: ahm mantra honesty
Objects.Description: Ahm, the Mantra of Honesty, is here.

Objects.Name: cah mantra sacrifice
Objects.Description: Cah, the Mantra of Sacrifice, is here.

Objects.Name: ra mantra valor
Objects.Description: Ra, the Mantra of Valor, is here.

Objects.Name: summ mantra honor
Objects.Description: Summ, the Mantra of Honor, is here.

Objects.Name: moonstone
Objects.Description: A totally featureless Moonstone is here.

Objects.Description: A totally featureless Moonstone is here.

Objects.Name: hourglass
Objects.Description: You feel an aura of power emanating from the Hourglass

Objects.Name: crook
Objects.Description: The crook lies here.

Objects.Name: doll
Objects.Description: An old rag doll is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The rag doll seems to take on the weight of the child you killed.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: Katrina's sword gleams prettily.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sword has been polished and tended with much care.  It glows with thelight of virtue.

Objects.Name: scroll
Objects.Description: A scroll has been rescued from the spider's web.

Objects.Name: dagger
Objects.Description: The magic dagger lies here, pulsating.

Objects.Name: robe
Objects.Description: The robes of a mage lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These robes are comfortable and clean.

Objects.Name: horseshoes
Objects.Description: Smithy's horseshoes are here.

Objects.Name: instrument mandolin
Objects.Description: The fine instrument lies here.

Objects.Name: cup
Objects.Description: The beggar's cup is here.

Objects.Name: gold pieces $$50
Objects.Description: Gold pieces.

Objects.Name: bottle
Objects.Description: Iolo's bottle sits here.

Objects.Name: bow
Objects.Description: Iolo's bow stands against a wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Crafted by the master himself, Iolo, the bow is finely made.  It's woodgleams, and as you pluck the string the clearest note sounds.

Objects.Name: chicken
Objects.Description: A chicken is lying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: As you look closer you see this isn't a real chicken, it's one of those gagrubber chickens.

Objects.Name: infinity bow
Objects.Description: The Infinity Bow floats here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bow is immense, yet light.  You see no string, but as your hands touchthe bow a string of pure energy appears and the bow vibrates with power.

Objects.Name: spear
Objects.Description: A simple wooden spear lies here.

Objects.Name: club
Objects.Description: A stone club is here.

Objects.Name: gavel
Objects.Description: The Judge's gavel lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The Gavel is made of ironwood, and seems to have some of the qualities ofJustice in it.

Objects.Name: staff
Objects.Description: Janna's staff lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Jaana's staff is strangely shaped, in a double helix form.  As you look atthe two snake-like pieces of wood, they seems to move.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: Geoffrey's sword gleams in the sun.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Geoffrey's sword is heavy but sharp.  When you touch the jeweled hilt, powerfloods into your arm.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: A simple sword is here.

Objects.Name: sword bastard
Objects.Description: Simon's monstrous bastard sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the biggest and best sword you've ever seen.  Its balance is perfectand it is sharp and sure.  When you grab it, you suddenly feel incrediblystrong, and incredibly courageous.

Objects.Name: hammer
Objects.Description: A tinker's hammer lies here.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: Julia's hot, glowing sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Julia was working on this sword when she was killed.  Though it has beenremoved from the forge for a long time, it seems to continue to glow as ifJulia's vengeful spirit has taken its place.

Objects.Name: amulet
Objects.Description: A most beautiful amulet lies in a pile here.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: A sword lies on the ground.

Objects.Name: armor
Objects.Description: A paladin's suit of armor lies here.

Objects.Name: rapier
Objects.Description: Dupre's rapier is here.

Objects.Name: boomerang
Objects.Description: A gargoyle's boomerang is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Though this seems like your basic boomerang, it is much more.  It hums withan unearthly tone, waiting for its power to be unleashed.

Objects.Name: rusty sword
Objects.Description: A corroded, rusty sword is here.

Objects.Name: rusty shield
Objects.Description: A spiked rusty shield lies here.

Objects.Name: cloak
Objects.Description: A magic cloak is here.

Objects.Name: aura power
Objects.Description: A bright light of power shoots into the air.

Objects.Name: red helmet face
Objects.Description: The empty shell of the Guardian head lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: When you slew the evil Guardian, all that was left was his corporal form thathe inhabited.  That of the big red head.

Objects.Name: spiked mace
Objects.Description: Waves of corruption come off this evilly enchanted spiked mace.

Objects.Name: black death armor
Objects.Description: This completely black armor reeks of death.

Objects.Name: evil charm
Objects.Description: You see a very oddly shaped charm... it might be worth it to look at its shape.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The charm looks to be a mummified part of a body.  It is about 3 inches long,and...  NO it could not be....

Objects.Name: evil gem
Objects.Description: The evil gem pulsates.

Objects.Name: helmet
Objects.Description: Sentri's helmet is here.

Objects.Name: sleeves
Objects.Description: Sentri's sleeves lie here.

Objects.Name: girth
Objects.Description: Sentri's girth is here.

Objects.Name: twohanded sword
Objects.Description: Sentri's two-handed sword is here.

Objects.Name: gloves
Objects.Description: Sentri's gloves are here.

Objects.Name: boots
Objects.Description: Sentri's boots are here.

Objects.Name: leggings
Objects.Description: Sentri left his leggings here.

Objects.Name: armor
Objects.Description: Sentri left his armor here.

Objects.Name: fellowship medallion
Objects.Description: A triangular shaped medallion is here.

Objects.Name: glass sword
Objects.Description: The most amazingly well crafted sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Invisible to the naked eye, this sword is the best crafted.  As you look atit, its amazing shape and size brings tears to your eyes.  You know that this isthe best weapon that you will ever see.

Objects.Name: crown
Objects.Description: A jewel encrusted crown is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Legend has it that this most perfect of crowns has within one of its jewels,a perfect ray of sunlight.  He who wears it must truly be enlightened.

Objects.Description: A pure gold sceptre is topped with a perfect crystal orb of power.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The orb of power is transparent to the point of sightlessness.  It holdswithin a vast store of power.

Objects.Name: silver amulet
Objects.Description: A silver amulet lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: British's amulet is in the shape of the great earth serpent.

Objects.Name: fountain
Objects.Description: A fountain shaped as an Ankh pours water.

Objects.Name: boat
Objects.Description: A boat lies here.
